articles.author: Eliza Gkritsi
articles.title: Trump threatens Iran with retaliation ‘at levels never seen before’ - politico.eu
articles.description: American leader says “we can easily get a deal done” to end the conflict, as Israel and Iran bombard each other overnight.
articles.content: “The U.S. had nothing to do with the attack on Iran, tonight,” said Trump in the small hours of Sunday. “If we are attacked in any way, shape or form by Iran, the full strength and might of the U.S. … [+1377 chars]
